quote: Arvex led the others into the light. “Wrecked if I ever dash miners again! This is one royal who won’t wipe their boots on our cousins anymore.” His grin made the carnage seem trivial.
quote_letters: ARVEX LED THE OTHERS INTO THE LIGHT WRECKED IF I EVER DASH MINERS AGAIN THIS IS ONE ROYAL WHO WONT WIPE THEIR BOOTS ON OUR COUSINS ANYMORE HIS GRIN MADE THE CARNAGE SEEM TRIVIAL
